mapper.sql: t.F_PID, T.F_TENANTS_PID, T.F_DEVICE_PID, T.F_DEVICE_DID, T.F_BUSITYPE, T.F_C1, T.F_C2, T.F_C3, T.F_C4, T.F_C5, t.F_SYS_FLAG, t.F_REMARK, t.F_LAST_MODIFIER, t.F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, t.F_CREATOR, t.F_CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_DEVICE_BUSITYPE ( F_PID, F_TENANTS_PID, F_DEVICE_PID, F_DEVICE_DID, F_BUSITYPE, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME )
SELECT #{entity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.tenants_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.device_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.device_did, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.busitype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{entity.sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
